About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I graduated from Master Academic Studies of Information Systems in Electronic Administration and Business Systems at the Technical Faculty "Mihajlo Pupin" in Zrenjanin. Apart from the acquired academic education, in pursuit of expanding my knowledge about new tools and technologies, I have completed the professional practice in the Municipal Administration of Zrenjanin. Successfully completed professional practice has strongly motivated me to make a progress in the field of Information Technologies; therefore I enrolled and effectively completed the advanced level of PHP programming.

Junior Front End Developer

I have knowledge about Front-End technologies (HTML, CSS, SCSS JavaScript),and Back-End Java and PHP.

Graphic Designer

I also worked in Illustrator, Photoshop and Adobe XD for designing websites and mobile apps. Design, prototype.You can see my works on Behance profile.

Quality Assurance and Testing

Debugging and Writing Tests in DevOps Using Selenium to write tests in Visual Studio Code, Also, I was shooting bugs in Selenium so it would be easier for developers to find the code bug.
